amendment.description: To require the provision of care under the Veterans Community Care Program for toxic-exposed veterans.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5185, under the order of 8/2/22, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 47. Record Vote Number: 279.

action.text: Amendment SA 5185 proposed by Senator Blackburn. (consideration: CR S3850; text: CR S3850) To require the provision of care under the Veterans Community Care Program for toxic-exposed veterans.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 5185, under the order of 8/2/22, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 47. Record Vote Number: 279.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 5185, under the order of 8/2/22, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 47. Record Vote Number: 279.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5185 proposed by Senator Blackburn.
